text:
I have an html document, generated by a perl cgi script, which has approx. 350 
variables in a FORM.  2.0.35 randomly crashes (just dies without returning) 
unless I comment out the <SELECT> and <OPTION VALUE=xxx> sections.

I use the same script, on the same machine, with apache 1.3.24, and it works 
fine.
creator: scottc@somix.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Please upgrade to 2.0.39 and reopen if this bug persists.  We expect
  it has been addressed, and I suspect that mod_include was the culprit.
